it.uniba.sotorrent

Interface ISOQuery

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SOQuery

    public interface ISOQuery
    ISOQuery.java ||Boundary|| Interface for running a query on Stack Overflow via Google's BigQuery service. It needs specific query execute methods and implementations, and getter methods. Returns must be Job types.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Returns the results from the query job (Edge).

      Returns the results from the query job.
      com.google.cloud.bigquery.Job runEdgeAnswer(int user, int limit)
      View the list of the first 100 couples (from, to) related to answers (Answer) written by a specific user.

      View the list of the first 100 triples (from, to, weight) related to answers (Answer) written by a specific user.

      com.google.cloud.bigquery.Job runNodeAnswerDate(int year, int month, int day, int limit)
      //mircocrit finds out the first 100 users who answered a question in a specific date, in asc. order.
      com.google.cloud.bigquery.Job runNodeAnswerTag(int year, int month, java.lang.String tag, int limit)
      finds out the first 100 users (User) which has made an answer (Answer) in a specific date using an argument (Tag), ordered cresc.
      com.google.cloud.bigquery.Job runNodePostDate(int year, int month, int day, int limit)
      //mpia3 finds out the first 100 users who has made a post(answers or questions) in a specific date, in asc. order.
      com.google.cloud.bigquery.Job runNodePostTag(int year, int month, java.lang.String tag, int limit)
      finds out the first 100 users (User) which has made a post (a post could be a question or an answer) in a specific date using an argument (Tag), ordered cresc.

      Starts the query.

      • getResults

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Long> getResults(com.google.cloud.bigquery.Job job)
                                                   throws com.google.cloud.bigquery.JobException,
                                                          java.lang.InterruptedException
        Returns the results from the query job.
        Parameters:
        job - The job associated to the query.
        Returns:
        Results as a hash map, with URL as key and view count as value.
        Throws:
        com.google.cloud.bigquery.JobException - Generic error occurred.
        java.lang.InterruptedException - Raised on timeouts.

      • getNode

        java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getNode(com.google.cloud.bigquery.Job query)
                                       throws com.google.cloud.bigquery.JobException,
                                              java.lang.InterruptedException
        Returns the results from the query job (Node).
        Parameters:
        query - The job associated to the query.
        Returns:
        Results as a ArrayList of Strings.
        Throws:
        com.google.cloud.bigquery.JobException - Generic error occurred.
        java.lang.InterruptedException - Raised on timeouts.

      • getEdge

        java.util.ArrayList<Edge> getEdge(com.google.cloud.bigquery.Job query)
                           throws com.google.cloud.bigquery.JobException,
                                  java.lang.InterruptedException
        Returns the results from the query job (Edge).
        Parameters:
        query - The job associated to the query.
        Returns:
        Results as a ArrayList of Edges.
        Throws:
        com.google.cloud.bigquery.JobException - Generic error occurred.
        java.lang.InterruptedException - Raised on timeouts.
